direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods are fundamental for object comparison and hash code generation, respectively.
Both methods involve synchronization and delegation to the decorated queue.
Both methods interact with the decorated queue and require synchronization.

enhanced_by.reason: Initializes the queue which is necessary for the hashCode method to operate on.
Adding elements to the queue can affect the state and thus the hashCode.
Both methods handle object comparisons and can be used to verify the consistency of hashCode.
